name: Tapz
description:
This game was made in 1 DAY for a challenge by Bbomb, from my Tiny Alien Pack

CONTROLS:
Mouse Click - Shoot
WASD/ UP + DOWN + LEFT + RIGHT Arrows - Movement

Where to Find Me • Videos • Support Me • Community • Updates

Summary: 

Tapz is a difficult, top-down bullet-hell shooter about surviving the malicious waves of enemies

A little bit about me :

I make video games, pixel art, and crappy youtube content :D

Credits:

Music:  Mello C - Lovusuno

Art:  DerpyDino35- Tiny Art Pack

My Tools:

Construct 3 - my game making software

Aseprite - my pixel art software

Itch.io - where I post all my games and art

Snip and sketch - my go-to for taking screenshots

Olive - my go-to for converting audio and whatnot video editing

Audicity -how I record audio

Freesound - music and audio
